frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: I have a strong foundation in frontend development, with a focus on creating responsive and user-friendly web applications. I am proficient in modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries, and I enjoy building interactive user interfaces.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: I have a solid understanding of backend development, with experience in building RESTful APIs and working with databases. I am skilled in Python and FastAPI, and I enjoy creating efficient and scalable server-side applications.

databases.title: Databases
databases.description: I have experience working with PostgreSQL, a powerful and reliable relational database management system. I am comfortable writing complex queries and optimizing database performance.

OS.title: Operating Systems
OS.description: I'm really into Linux. My personal computer runs on Linux mint, and I have experience with Ubuntu. I also have some experience with Windows, but I prefer Linux for development and personal use.
